name: Dark Souls III
description: Dark Souls III continues to push the boundaries with the latest, ambitious chapter in critically-acclaimed and genre-defining series. As fires fade and only embers remain, journey once more into a world filled with more daunting and colossal enemies and environments. Players will be immersed into a world of epic atmosphere and darkness through faster gameplay and amplified combat intensity. New to the series are the Battle Arts attacks. You'll be able to deliver powerful attacks that will break through enemy defenses. Each weapon will have its own unique Battle Arts.

trailers.title: Dark Souls™ III – Gameplay Reveal Trailer
trailers.description:
Dark Souls III continues to push the boundaries with the latest, ambitious chapter in critically-acclaimed and genre-defining series.  As fires fade and only embers remain, journey once more into a world filled with more daunting and colossal enemies and environments.   Players will be immersed into a world of epic atmosphere and darkness through faster gameplay and amplified combat intensity.  New to the series are the Battle Arts attacks.   You'll be able to deliver powerful attacks that will break through enemy defenses.  Each weapon will have its own unique Battle Arts.   

Embrace The Darkness!
Early 2016
